lead_paragraph: Australia coach Darren Lehmann has urged cricket's governing body to help reduce the workload on players competing in all three forms of the game as he fears the current packed schedule is unsustainable.

headline.print_headline: Lehmann Urges ICC Intervention to Prevent Player Burnout
headline.main: Lehmann Urges ICC Intervention to Prevent Player Burnout

snippet: Australia coach Darren Lehmann has urged cricket's governing body to help reduce the workload on players competing in all three forms of the game as he fears the current packed schedule is unsustainable....
